name: Zero Age
description:
A Game by Majd Akar and Hosni Auji

• Indie Prize Europe 2015 - Finalist •

An atmospheric puzzle adventure.
Acquire Beam powers and explore the possibilities they afford you. Master each Beam in order to solve challenging puzzles and journey through the various worlds of Zero Age.

• IMPORTANT •
This game is compatible with the iPad 2 (or newer) but is best experienced on the fourth-generation iPad (or newer).
This game is NOT compatible with the first iPad, the iPhone or the iPod Touch.

• Special Thanks •
To everyone playing the game and sending us their input and words of encouragement. A special shout out to PJ, Zooz and Monarella for really stress testing our puzzles.
